name: Me and the boids
description:
Why you should play:

Increasing boids size to defend forest.

Bees shooting lasers/ saving forest from evil lumberjack.

Fighting stronger enemies with more boids

cool graphics/ easy to understand gameplay.

Controls:

Mouse - aim.

Mouse left click - attack;

Sorry if game lacks balancing. Honestly I didn't had time to tweak it because of personal reasons. Hope you enjoy.
